.. py:class:: PenaltyDefense

   Bases: :py:obj:`stp.play.Play`

   Play consists of:
                   -5 robots lined up on the side
                   -1 goalie
   The goalie will defend the opponents penalty kick.

   .. py:method:: tick(self, world_state: stp.rc.WorldState) -> List[rj_msgs.msg.RobotIntent]
